org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowCursorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowBaseAdapter
      • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowCursorAdapter
  • Deprecated. 
    This class will be removed in Robolectric 3.5. The real Android CursorAdapter will be used instead.

    @Implements(value=android.widget.CursorAdapter.class)
 @Deprecated
public class ShadowCursorAdapter
extends ShadowBaseAdapter

      Deprecated. 
      void setViews(java.util.List<android.view.View> views)
      Deprecated. 
      This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.5. The normal Android getView(int, View, ViewGroup) behavior will be used instead.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        @Implementation
 @Deprecated
public android.view.View getView(int position,
                                                              android.view.View convertView,
                                                              android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Deprecated. 

        If setViews(List) has been called, a corresponding view from that list will be returned.

        Otherwise, behaves like CursorAdapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup).

      • setViews

        @Deprecated
public void setViews(java.util.List<android.view.View> views)
        Deprecated. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.5. The normal Android getView(int, View, ViewGroup) behavior will be used instead.

        Sets a list of views to be returned for successive calls to getView(int, View, ViewGroup).

        Parameters:
        views - The list of views
